mapper.select: select board_no, user_no, board_title, board_content, board_write, board_date, board_like, board_count, board_del from board where board_no = #{no} and board_del = '1'
mapper.insert: insert into board(user_no, board_title, board_content, board_write) values (#{user_no}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{board_write})
mapper.select: select board_no, board_title, board_like, board_count, (board_like+board_count) as board_react from board order by board_react desc
select board_no, board_title, board_like, board_count, board_date from board order by board_date desc
